Pflugerville.Austin International School: Austin International School (AIS) is a private school located in northern Austin, Texas, United States, for students in pre-kindergarten (petite section) through 5th grade (CM2). In August 2017, it will be opening the first year of middle school with a new 6th grade class. AIS's Primary School program follows a seamless curriculum model of trilingual education, with students studying all subjects seamlessly in French, English, and Spanish.
